name: untappd_scrape_beer
description: Scrape details for a specific beer on Untappd including name, brewery, style, ABV, rating, and description.

parameters.name: beer_id
parameters.description: Beer numeric ID from Untappd URL (e.g. '1787965' from untappd.com/b/beer-name/1787965)

steps.code: const name = document.querySelector('h1, .name h1')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const brewery = document.querySelector('.brewery a, h2 a')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const style = document.querySelector('.style, .beer-style')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const abv = document.querySelector('.abv, [class*="abv"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const rating = document.querySelector('.num, .rating .num, [class*="rating-num"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const desc = document.querySelector('.beer-descrption, .beer-description, .desc p')?.textContent?.trim()?.slice(0, 500) || ''; return { name, brewery, style, abv, rating, description: desc, url: window.location.href };
steps.name: result
steps.label: Extract data
